content.rendered:
Comprehensive B2B payment processing in Los Angeles.

B2B businesses require solutions that address their complex needs. Get systems that are easy to implement and manage from Dynamic Merchant Solutions.

Accept Payments Now

Best B2B payment processing company in Los Angeles.

Invoicing, payment processing, credit cards, and reporting, all in one.

Top-of-the-line security to protect your reputation.
I am item content. Click edit button to change this text. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Ut elit tellus, luctus nec ullamcorper mattis, pulvinar dapibus leo.
Fully integrated with most ERP and accounts receivable systems.
I am item content. Click edit button to change this text. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Ut elit tellus, luctus nec ullamcorper mattis, pulvinar dapibus leo.

Expand and improve your B2B operations.

Sending and tracking invoices, running customer payments, or reaching out when there’s a problem takes up time for your B2B organization. Dynamic Merchant Solutions offers credit card payment processing that can streamline this. Not only do we give you a platform to handle the actual payments, but you can use that same platform to send and track invoices and other vital customer data. This all-in-one solution makes sense, and it’s more affordable than other B2B payment processing options, too 

Seamless integration, ongoing support.

With Dynamic Merchant Solutions, you can implement our B2B online payment processing with your existing business structure. If you already have an invoicing system that works, then add the credit card processing. If you want us to handle it all, link us to your current inventory management system. You’ll receive exceptional support from our knowledgeable team every step of the way, making it the logical solution for your B2B payment processing needs. Focus on serving your customers while we focus on ensuring you can take payments without delay. 

01 02

Merchant Services in
Los Angeles

Whether you are processing payments in-store, online, or keyed in a virtual terminal, you’ll get the best rates with Dynamic Merchant Solutions.
Get Your Custom Rate
No application or setup fees
No hidden fees
24/7 customer services
